alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 3:06PM MDT until August 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 306 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in the Short Creek drainage. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. This includes the following streams and drainages... South Creek, Short Creek and Second Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
